entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
